Description:
Detects Bitsadmin connections to IP addresses instead of FQDN names

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Bitsadmin to Uncommon IP Server Address
Query: c-useragent="Microsoft BITS/*" (cs-host="*1" OR cs-host="*2" OR cs-host="*3" OR cs-host="*4" OR cs-host="*5" OR cs-host="*6" OR cs-host="*7" OR cs-host="*8" OR cs-host="*9")
